website_summaries.verdict: With its large barrel comes a wider sweet spot, giving you a higher chance at hitting one out of the park.
pros: We love that this model comes with a comfortable rubber grip to save your hands from splinters or tenderness
The increased sweet spot makes it easy for anyone to get in a good hit
We also found the heavy maple wood paired with the cupped end produced a well balanced feel
cons: Sits at a slightly higher price point

customer_reviews.title: Mizuno Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought one 34 for my son who plays in an adult league and is a very good hitter. First off, the bat is like a beautiful piece of furniture in terms of finish quality. An umpire commented to him about what a nice bat it is. It has performed well for him, with a run of shots to the fence for easy doubles. It sounds great too, with a very solid crack. Expensive bat, but short of professional caliber bats, this is about as good as it gets.
customer_reviews.author: Emer

customer_reviews.title: Balanced and more
customer_reviews.text: My son uses this bat in his fall baseball league, and its been one of the best he's had. He was a moderately successful batter for a long time until he ordered this one, and the balance and weight turned him into a great hitter. We'll stick with Mizuno bats for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: M.S.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bat, but Heavier Than Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bat for my 13 yo son for Christmas. Bought the 32/29 so we were expecting a drop 3 bat. However, it felt heavy to me so I weighed it and this one weighs 31.5 oz....so it's actually a drop .5 bat. Thought about returning it, but decided to keep it to use in practice. He's a pretty big, strong kid (5'8", 125 lbs), but doubtful he could get this thing around against a hard throwing pitcher. His normal bat is a 32/27, so this is a big jump.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Fichte

customer_reviews.title: Very good bat
customer_reviews.text: Bat is very good. I have bought 2 of these bats. The first one lasted a whole hard ball season. Have had the other one currently now. I like that it comes with the hand grip already on the bat. Good product for the price. Just remember with any wood bat that you can break it on the first contact. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph carola

customer_reviews.title: This is a great transition bat when first moving from a metal bat ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great transition bat when first moving from a metal bat to a wooden bat league. Unlike most wooden bats, this had a traditional leather handle wrap which reduces shock.
customer_reviews.author: Marta S. Rivara

customer_reviews.title: Good pop
customer_reviews.text: Son loves this bat. First lasted a long time. He feels it has more pop than the local custom made bats and he hit ~320ft grand slam last week.
customer_reviews.author: Desmo

customer_reviews.title: Great balance and lots of pop in the bat
customer_reviews.text: Great balance and lots of pop in the bat. Not too sensitive of a sweet spot when you hit, as long as you get a good piece of the ball it'll go.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: high quality bat
customer_reviews.text: My 15 year old son has fallen in love with this bat. I bought him this bat for making honor roll. It is a great quality bat and he has been hitting it out of the park!
customer_reviews.author: Guest

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this bat
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! Looks great and performs well. Great wood bat!
customer_reviews.author: photo takin' mom

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels great according to my son who plays in an adult league.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. A Great looking bat you don’t even want to hit with it. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Craig F

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wooden baseball bat!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, design and color. Easy to lift and swing. Love batting with it!
customer_reviews.author: Blanca

customer_reviews.title: Great bat
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this bat. He is 15 and plays on a couple of teams. This is perfect for batting practice and games. He loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Ciccone

customer_reviews.title: Great Bat!
customer_reviews.text: Son loves the bat for his senior league, has held up great!!
customer_reviews.author: what a great game!

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Son used it for a year, 3 seasons of baseball and it held up great. Never had to regrip either. Looking to buy another since he’s gone up a couple ounces.
customer_reviews.author: Matt F

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFULL BAT.Looks like a piece of fine furniture.
customer_reviews.text: Grandson used it in summer wood bat league (13 yr. old). Loved it. Gonna use it in the fall. Great feel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bat you can trust
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bat and love the finish. Don’t think we will be breaking this one like the ash bats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Bat
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased three of these and my son plays college ball and really likes the end loaded bat style. Very durable and good quality maple bat.
customer_reviews.author: Jen S.

customer_reviews.title: Solid Bat, Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Solid bat. Good feel, good weight distribution. It is also reasonably durable. This is my second one and the first lasted me two full seasons without breaking!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh
customer_reviews.text: 5/10 on pop scale in senior american legion is tourney.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey S.

customer_reviews.title: Great bat
customer_reviews.text: Great bat, my kid loves it, and it feels solid and heavy. He uses it for batting practice, and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe23

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it!
customer_reviews.text: It just broke at the first hit!!! Waste of money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Angel Barajas Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Came with a ding in the bat.
customer_reviews.text: We just received this bat today. Pulled it out of the box and was looking at it and it has a ding in it. Very disappointing the bat is beautiful other than the ding.
customer_reviews.author: jenny

customer_reviews.title: Its great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bat for by grandson and it works great, and has not broke for a couple months
customer_reviews.author: pen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and balance bat.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bat. Balance swing. Son used it for tourney for college club baseball team.
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: Just broke it.
customer_reviews.text: Got one summer out of it and split it the long way down the barrel. It happens. It was a good bat.
customer_reviews.author: steven smith

customer_reviews.title: Broke on the first at bat
customer_reviews.text: Not a good bat...did not even make it past the first at bat or first pitch
customer_reviews.author: Tk

customer_reviews.title: nice pop off the barrel
customer_reviews.text: The weight is evenly distributed, nice pop off the barrel. Not sure how long it will last, definitely nice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Pienciak

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful finish.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful finish... exact weight and length as specified. Will update this review after a few batting practices and the summer baseball season.
customer_reviews.author: OdieF22

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this bat, he cannot wait for ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this bat, he cannot wait for regular season to try it out. Currently he is using it at his clinics and prefers this bat over his other composite bats.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Emmons

customer_reviews.title: Holding up really well. Sounds Great!
customer_reviews.text: 15yo son played in a Babe Ruth league that promoted wood bat week. He used a league bat. He loved the feel and wanted his own. We purchased this 1 mainly on name brand. He loved it at 1st sight. This spring he has finally gotten out to use it during his practices. He still prefers his Cat 7/8 but he pulls this out often as well. He has delivered some good hits with it. Of course i love the sound it gives on a solid hit! Bat has held up very nice so far. We know its wood and can break. But this so far has been a great introduction bat.
customer_reviews.author: Ggossard

customer_reviews.title: Mizuno comes with Style and Pop
customer_reviews.text: Bought bat somewhere else. Paid about the same. Son loved it! This bat lasted longer than expected in Year 1 of HS Practices/BP & Games in the Summer Wood bat Tournaments. The bat has Pop, Extremely well balanced & it looks darn good. Finally cracked during BP in it's 2nd Yr. of HS baseball. Loved the Mizuno Wood bats so much we bought two more of a different model. just because until now I could not find this bat!! what the heck. our new Mizuno still features same wood, feel and performance. We do like this Look the Brown/Black handle the best. Though we cover handle with Lizard Skin
customer_reviews.author: schoonz

customer_reviews.title: Made it 3 whole months
customer_reviews.text: Loved the bat. Used if for batting practice and in 4 tournament games. In the fourth game, it cracked from the handle up through the barrel when I caught one off the end of the bat. I really thought that it would have been more durable. 😕
customer_reviews.author: Avid Runner

product_meta.title: Mizuno Maple Elite Baseball Bat - MZM 110
product_meta.description: The Mizuno maple Elite Baseball bat features rock hard maple hand selected top quality material. New bigger barrel designs for better performance and increased sweet spot. Light weight premium material used to keep swing weight balanced. Rich professional grade finish. Cupped end for lighter swing weight. Mizuno exclusive supra-helix grip provides comfort and durability.
feature_bullets: Rock hard maple hand selected top quality material
Cupped end for lighter swing weight
